QuestData.Title: Search More Hovels
QuestData.Description: This grouping of murloc hovels, after a thorough inspection, reveals nothing.$B$B...but you're certain that the next clue you find will be fruitful.$B$BOne of the hovels to the north must have the Menethil statuette!
QuestData.LogDescription: Continue searching the Murloc hovels for the Menethil Statuette.
QuestData.RewardText: This barrel is halfway buried amidst the mud and grass ...
